text: WLNI (105.9 FM) is a News/Talk formatted broadcast radio station licensed to Lynchburg, Virginia, serving Metro Lynchburg. WLNI is owned and operated by Mel Wheeler, Inc. ==Programming== WLNI programming consists mostly of network programming such as Coast to Coast AM, Glenn Beck, Rush Limbaugh and Sean Hannity. WLNI also airs Virginia Tech football and basketball. ==References== ==External links== * * LNI Category:Talk radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 1994 Category:1994 establishments in Virginia
title: WLNI
